Articles.Content: I can't find the documentation on the more recent part cfg features, particularly externally referencing a model not in the same part folder.

Here are some links:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/34013-0-20-PartTools-GameDatabase-and-new-features <-- model nodes. Other posts in the thread explain it better than Mu.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/34013?p=454874&viewfull=1#post454874 <--- for example this one has an example.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/entries/829 <--- Model node tutorial

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/entries/833 <--- Second model node tutorial

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35225-Some-lesser-known-bits-of-info-for-addon-developers <-- miscellaneous 0.20 information.

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/fwgf4y20ida2lat/GVW-OEvQQ4 <--- download of 0.18 part.cfg documentation (semi-outdated, but generally good)

All you need is

MODEL

{

model = (folder in gamedata)/(subfolders)/model file name

position = 0.0, 0.0, 0.0

scale = 1.0, 1.0, 1.0

rotation = 0, 0, 0

}

Note that they're forward slashes, not backslashes.

Edited October 4, 2013 by Supernovy
